name: Mime Jr.
author: Noriko Hotta
flavor_text: In an attempt to confuse its enemy, it mimics the enemy’s movements. Then it wastes no time in making itself scarce!

poke_body.name: Sweet Sleeping Face
poke_body.effect: As long as Mime Jr. is Asleep, prevent all damage done to Mime Jr. by attacks.

attacks.name: Sleepy Lost
attacks.effect: Put the top card of your opponent’s deck in the Lost Zone. Mime Jr. is now Asleep.
